```{r}
library("lmtest")
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(broom)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
heart.data <- read.csv("Datos/heart.data.csv")
```

```{r}
heart.disease.lm<-lm(heart.disease ~ biking + smoking, data = heart.data)

summary(heart.disease.lm)
```

```{r}
bptest(heart.disease.lm)
```
